name: Leaf
description: Leaf is an exploration driven action adventure game where you're on a quest to stabilize two abandoned worlds. On your adventure you stumble across hidden weapons, spells and special items that might help you on your journey.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: 3 GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 560 or better Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
